after TokenSystem","params":{"_tokenAddr":"is address of token contract"}},"createCampaign(string,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Add an element to variable campaigns array","params":{"_days":"is deadline for fundraising of a campaign. Min: 15 days","_goal":"is goal of a campaign. Min-Max: 100.000-1.000.000.000","_name":"is campaign name"}},"endCampaign(uint256)":{"details":"If campaign is succeed, fundraiser will receive funds","params":{"_i":"is index of campaign array"}},"getFinStatus(uint256)":{"params":{"_i":"is index of campaign"},"return":"{0 => pending, 1 => accepted, 2 => paid}"},"getInfo(uint256)":{"params":{"_index":"is index of campaigns array"},"return":"object {name, startDate, endDate, goal, collected, owner, finStatus, status}"},"getInvest(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_addr":"is address of investor that you want to check","_i":"is index of campaigns"},"return":"Number of token that investor invested for a campaign"},"getNumberOfInvestors(uint256)":{"params":{"_i":"is index of campaign"},"return":"Number of investors of a campaign"},"getStatus(uint256)":{"params":{"_i":"is index of campaigns array"},"return":"{0 => during, 1 => failed, 2 => succeed, 3 => paid}"},"getTotalInvest(address)":{"details":"Get all amount of investor that invested and have checked campaign failed or succeed If campaign is failed, NOT count that token","params":{"_addr":"is address that you want check to amount of invest"},"return":"Number of token that invested all campaigns"},"invest(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_i":"is index of campaigns array","_token":"is amount of token that you buy function will call token.fundToCampaign to verify"}},"length()":{"return":"Number of campaigns"}},"title":"This contract store info about campaigns"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"acceptCampaign(uint256)":{"notice":"Accept a campaign is allow all investor can invest to that campaign"},"claimRefund(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Allow investor can claim refund when campaign during when campaign failed, you don't need claim refund, because it is automatic proccess"},"constructor":"Constructor to create a campaign contract","createCampaign(string,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Create a campaign"},"endCampaign(uint256)":{"notice":"Handle after campaign. devdoc.author: tuanlh

constructor.details: This contract MUST be run after TokenSystem

createCampaign(string,uint256,uint256).details: Add an element to variable campaigns array

params._days: is deadline for fundraising of a campaign. Min: 15 days
params._goal: is goal of a campaign. Min-Max: 100.000-1.000.000.000

endCampaign(uint256).details: If campaign is succeed, fundraiser will receive funds

getInfo(uint256).return: object {name, startDate, endDate, goal, collected, owner, finStatus, status}

params._addr: is address of investor that you want to check

getInvest(uint256,address).return: Number of token that investor invested for a campaign

getNumberOfInvestors(uint256).return: Number of investors of a campaign

getTotalInvest(address).details: Get all amount of investor that invested and have checked campaign failed or succeed If campaign is failed, NOT count that token

params._addr: is address that you want check to amount of invest

getTotalInvest(address).return: Number of token that invested all campaigns

params._token: is amount of token that you buy function will call token.fundToCampaign to verify

devdoc.title: This contract store info about campaigns

acceptCampaign(uint256).notice: Accept a campaign is allow all investor can invest to that campaign

claimRefund(uint256,uint256).notice: Allow investor can claim refund when campaign during when campaign failed, you don't need claim refund, because it is automatic proccess

methods.constructor: Constructor to create a campaign contract

endCampaign(uint256).notice: Handle after campaign. Only allow campaign owner run this function

getInvest(uint256,address).notice: Get token invested for a campaign of investor

getNumberOfInvestors(uint256).notice: Count how many people invested into a campaign

getTotalInvest(address).notice: Get all amount of investor that invest to campaigns

invest(uint256,uint256).notice: Allow user can buy token of campaign
